summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NovaToken NFT Marketplace. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI loads properly with all navigation, responsive design, and core functionality working as expected.
passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, stats, featured collections, and trending NFTs
Collections page displays all NFT collections with proper grid layout
Collection detail page shows collection info and NFTs correctly
NFT detail page displays NFT info with price and Buy Now button
Profile page shows connect wallet prompt when not connected
Connect Wallet button present and clickable in header
Navigation between pages works correctly (Explore, Collections links)
Mobile responsive design works with mobile menu functionality
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all core functionality working)
